oneToThree.heading: Weather Today (1–3 days)
oneToThree.text: Light rain (total 5mm), mostly falling on Wed night. Warm (max 31°C on Mon afternoon, min 21°C on Wed night). Wind will be generally light.

fourToSeven.heading: Weather (4–7 days)
fourToSeven.text: Heavy rain (total 21mm), heaviest during Thu afternoon. Warm (max 29°C on Sat afternoon, min 20°C on Sat night). Winds decreasing (fresh winds from the ENE on Thu night, light winds from the NE by Fri night).

sevenToTen.heading: Weather (7–10 days)
sevenToTen.text: Mostly dry. Warm (max 30°C on Sun afternoon, min 19°C on Mon night). Wind will be generally light.

tenToTwelve.heading: Weather Next Week (10–12 days)
tenToTwelve.text: Mostly dry. Warm (max 30°C on Thu afternoon, min 19°C on Fri night). Wind will be generally light.
